Html:
Hello Team

I have installed a new Server 2012 Essentials with the current Release of Package Publisher.
The self published Cert is stored. If i try to create an package i get an error.
"Failed to sign package, error was 214794403"
Can you please help me?

thanks computerversteher

There is a similar discussion four thread down from this one.

Please review it. https://wsuspackagepublisher.codeplex.com/discussions/465355 to see if this helps
